name: Thursday's Food Panic
description:
"Good morning,"  you think as you wake up. Life is great as an indoor cat. However, there's a slight problem. today:  The Human has forgotten to feed you! Scavenge whatever food you can, get help from friends, or just wait it out!

How much chaos will you cause?

Acknowledgements
  • 🐀 This game was made in Narrat, created by Nalaria.
  • 🎨 Background images created by Noraneko. The rest of the assets are CC0.
  • 🎼 magna crusher by kaleidoplasm.
  • 🎂 Happy birthday, Luke.
